reviews.review_msg:
I've had Wynnie in both IAT 110 and IAT 103w. I found her to be a highly organized, slow, and harsh grader in both. Although, unlike many profs, she gives a well laid out grading criteria and is always available for questions about previous/current work. 

She was more fun and interesting in 110 than in 103w.

Despite this class being online, the prof was really organized. There were high expectations, and the research paper was marked a bit hard. The final project made no sense and had no proper scope/criteria to follow. Do well on the research paper and it can save your grade if you don't do too well on the midterm + final project.
